key.name: wallpaper-scaling
key.description: Which wallpaper style to use (0 - solid color, 1 - scaled, 2 - zoomed).

key.name: wallpaper-color
key.description: Background color for the wallpaper (for the "Solid color" mode or for a background for scaled images), stored as an array of three integers: Red, Green, Blue (0-255).

key.name: available-wallpapers
key.description: List of wallpaper files available in the wallpaper picker in settings. Also used for the slideshow mode.

key.name: use-gnome-background
key.description: If enabled, the launcher inherits the wallpaper from GNOME settings. (Note that this setting only works with GNOME's control center.)

key.name: slideshow-mode
key.description: In slideshow mode, the launcher automatically loops over available wallpapers.

key.name: slideshow-switch-delay
key.description: Time between each wallpaper switch in slideshow mode, in seconds.

key.name: slideshow-switch-counter
key.description: Keeps the last slideshow switch countdown position.

key.name: theme-preference
key.description: Whether to use light theme, dark theme or follow system theme. (0 - follow system theme, 1 - light, 2 - dark)

key.name: autorefresh-delay
key.description: Amount of time (in seconds) between automatic widget refreshing. Set to 0 to disable autorefresh. (Default: 900 seconds - 15 minutes)

key.name: favorite-apps
key.description: List of favorite apps for the app chooser, stored as paths to their .desktop files.

key.name: time-format
key.description: Time format string for the clock, using the format described in the documentation at https://docs.python.org/3/library/time.html#time.strftime.

key.name: date-format
key.description: Date format string for the clock, using the format described in the documentation at https://docs.python.org/3/library/time.html#time.strftime.
